alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:40PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRENGTHENING THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FORT BEND AND SOUTH CENTRAL HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CST... At 439 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Town West, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Northeastern Sugar Land, northern Missouri City, Stafford, Bellaire, West University Place, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Mission Bend, Neartown / Montrose, Town West, Memorial Park, University Place, Spring Valley, Astrodome Area, Afton Oaks / River Oaks Area, Greater Heights, Midtown Houston, and Macgregor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
